name: Recon Information for Export with Command Prompt
description: Once established within a system or network, an adversary may use automated techniques for collecting internal data.
query: ((process.executable:(/.*\\[Tt][Rr][Ee][Ee]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Mm][Ii][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Dd][Oo][Ss][Kk][Ee][Yy]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR process.pe.original_file_name:(/[Ww][Mm][Ii][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Dd][Oo][Ss][Kk][Ee][Yy]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Ss][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) AND process.parent.command_line:/.*\ \>\ %[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]%\\.*/)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:(*\\tree.com OR *\\WMIC.exe OR *\\doskey.exe OR *\\sc.exe) OR process.pe.original_file_name:(wmic.exe OR DOSKEY.EXE OR sc.exe)) AND process.parent.command_line:*\ >\ %TEMP%\\*)`
